name: Scavenger (itch) (Lewis Stephens)
description:
Summary

 Scavenger is a 2D Roguelike, turn-based game where the player must survive for as many days as possible. Each level is procedurally generated and the player must find their way to the exit. The catch is that the more you move, the hungrier you become. In order to survive each day you’ll need to collect food and avoid enemies.

How to Play
  • WASD to move
Project Outcomes

After completing this project I am now able to:

  • Use sprite sheets to create character animations 
  • Use Animator Override Controllers to have the same animation state machine play different animations 
  • Create a system to procedurally generate tile-based levels
  • Create a simple AI that follows player movement
  • Implement a turn-based movement system
  • Add a hunger system
